subject: Math
title: Solving Quadratic Equations by Factoring
description: Learn how to solve quadratic equations using the factoring method

content.text: In this lesson, we'll explore how to solve quadratic equations by factoring. This is one of the most fundamental techniques in algebra.

content.heading: What is Factoring?
content.text: Factoring is the process of breaking down a quadratic expression into simpler expressions that multiply together to give the original equation.
